DOC.brief_title: Improving Bowel Cleansing With Smart Phone Application
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Getting ready colonoscopy difficult involve lot step . The information give patient important adherence treatment . The investigator create novel smart phone application ( SPA ) aim increase bowel preparation quality patient satisfaction , use different educational tool . Methods : The investigator perform prospective , endoscopist-blinded , randomize , control trial . The investigator enrol 260 outpatient owner smartphone . Patients randomly allocate two different protocol : instruction provide SPA ( SPA group ; n=108 ) write instruction visual aid ( control group ; n=152 ) . All procedure perform afternoon time patient receive purgative regimen ( 2-L PEG solution plus ascorbic acid ) , full-dose same-day regimen . The day colonoscopy ( Baseline ) , patient initiate low fiber diet . The study design detect improvement quality bowel preparation use Harefield Cleansing Scale ( HCS ) scale . The effect protocol patient satisfaction assess specific questionnaire time colonoscopy .
